pages.text: The Advanced Clicker is an upgraded version of the $(l:justdirethings:mach_clickert1)Simple Clicker$(/l).It can affect a larger area, and will also support filtering blocks or entities.$(br2)Use a spawn egg or creature catcher to filter entities.$(br2)This can be used for a mob farm, if set to left click hostiles, or an animal breeder if set to right click adults!
